detail_desc: Push-up bra in microfibre with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Metal rings in various designs.
Two-strand, thin metal chain necklace with two round hammered metal pendants. Adjustable length 42-50 cm.
Two-strand, thin metal chain necklace with two round hammered metal pendants. Adjustable length 42-50 cm.

Lightweight down jacket in a quilted weave with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and welt side pockets with a concealed zip. Filling 70% recycled down and 30% recycled feathers from Re:Down®.

Lightweight down jacket in a quilted weave with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and welt side pockets with a concealed zip. Filling 70% recycled down and 30% recycled feathers from Re:Down®.
Two-strand thin metal chain necklace with pendants. One chain is decorated with small bead pendants and the other has a pendant with plastic stone. Adjustable length approx. 42-33 cm.

Top in jersey crêpe with a gently rounded neckline that has covered elastication at the back. Short puff sleeves with elastication and a frill trim over the shoulders and elasticated hems. Gathered tiers for added volume.

Top in jersey crêpe with a gently rounded neckline that has covered elastication at the back. Short puff sleeves with elastication and a frill trim over the shoulders and elasticated hems. Gathered tiers for added volume.

TOCA LIFE x H&M. Set with a vest top and pair of shorts in soft cotton. Vest top in jersey with a print motif on the front and contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline and armholes. Knee-length shorts in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed, elasticated, drawstring waist.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter from 1.5 cm to 2 cm.
Knee-length jacket in lightweight, patterned viscose twill with dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves and a gently rounded hem with slits in the sides. No fasteners.
Trousers in washed cotton twill. Relaxed fit with concealed elastication and a button at the waist, zip fly, utility pockets at the front and fake back pockets with a flap.
Necklace with three metal chains in various designs, one with a round pendant with a marble-patterned plastic bead. Adjustable length.
Anklets in different designs, one with plastic beads and one in metal chain. Adjustable length 22-25 cm.
Short, voluminous dress with a deep V-neck that has a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. 3/4-length puff sleeves with cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Short, voluminous dress with a deep V-neck that has a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. 3/4-length puff sleeves with cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Short, voluminous dress with a deep V-neck that has a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. 3/4-length puff sleeves with cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Short, wide dress in patterned chiffon with a mandarin collar, opening at the top and ties at the neckline. Gathered yoke at the back, long puff sleeves and cuffs with covered buttons. Gathered seam at the waist and hem with a wide flounced trim. Satin lining.

Long, flared dress in an airy weave with a double-layered, stand-up collar, long ties at the back of the neck and an opening at the back. Voluminous, elbow-length sleeves, and seams at the waist and hips for added width. V-neck underdress in woven fabric with adjustable shoulder straps. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Oversized lace shirt with a pointed collar and buttons down the front. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, two open chest pockets, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Oversized lace shirt with a pointed collar and buttons down the front. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, two open chest pockets, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in lace with scalloped, V-shaped flounces front and back. High collar, covered buttons and an opening at the back of the neck, short, scalloped sleeves and a concealed zip at the back. V-shaped, gathered seam at the waist and a flared, scallop-hemmed skirt. V-neck underdress in woven fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. The polyamide content of the dress’s outer layer is recycled.

Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Wide flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders to the back. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist and a peplum at the hem. Unlined.
Short, A-line dress in woven fabric with a sheen. Square neckline, voluminous flutter sleeves and a gathered seam and flounce at the hem for added volume. Lined.

Wide dress in an airy, textured weave with a round, gathered neckline, dropped shoulders and short, wide puff sleeves. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and a drawstring at the waist with narrow ties at the front. Skirt with inset sections at the sides for added volume and a shorter front. V-neck jersey underdress with adjustable shoulder straps.

Wide dress in an airy, textured weave with a round, gathered neckline, dropped shoulders and short, wide puff sleeves. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and a drawstring at the waist with narrow ties at the front. Skirt with inset sections at the sides for added volume and a shorter front. V-neck jersey underdress with adjustable shoulder straps.

Wide dress in an airy, textured weave with a round, gathered neckline, dropped shoulders and short, wide puff sleeves. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and a drawstring at the waist with narrow ties at the front. Skirt with inset sections at the sides for added volume and a shorter front. V-neck jersey underdress with adjustable shoulder straps.

Long dress in patterned, crinkled chiffon with a V-neck and an asymmetric seam under the bust with pleats and decorative metal beads, and a short frill trim at the sides. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, narrow elastication at the bottom of the open back, and a wide, softly draping skirt. Lined.
Maxi skirt in an airy, patterned, softly draping weave. High waist with a wide, draped, waistband and smocking and a concealed zip at the back. Satin lining.
Maxi skirt in an airy, patterned, softly draping weave. High waist with a wide, draped, waistband and smocking and a concealed zip at the back. Satin lining.

Short, fitted dress in an airy brocade weave with a shimmering gold-coloured pattern. Round neckline, a concealed zip at the back and a hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck. Short, voluminous puff sleeves with narrow, concealed elastication at the hems. Seam at the waist and a gathered seam at the front to create a draped effect. Partly lined in satin.

Round-necked top in an airy brocade weave with a shimmering gold-coloured pattern. Hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck, a concealed zip at the back and short, voluminous puff sleeves with narrow, concealed elastication. Pleat at the wait to create a fitted silhouette. Partly lined in satin.

Long kaftan in a crinkled weave with a slight sheen. V-neck and gathered seams under the bust and at the back to create a gentle draping effect. Short, wide sleeves that are open at the top, and a rounded hem. Lined.

Long kaftan in a crinkled weave with a slight sheen. V-neck and gathered seams under the bust and at the back to create a gentle draping effect. Short, wide sleeves that are open at the top, and a rounded hem. Lined.

Short, A-line dress in woven fabric. Narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps, a small frill trim around the neckline and gathered seams creating tiers in the skirt for added volume. Lined.

Short, A-line dress in woven fabric. Narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps, a small frill trim around the neckline and gathered seams creating tiers in the skirt for added volume. Lined.

Short, A-line dress in woven fabric. Narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps, a small frill trim around the neckline and gathered seams creating tiers in the skirt for added volume. Lined.
Short skirt in airy chiffon. High waist with wide smocking to create a fitted style at the top and width at the hem. Jersey lining.

Short dress in woven fabric with a smocked bodice and square neckline with concealed elastication and a small frill trim. Short puff sleeves with smocking and a frill trim at the hems, a seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.

Short dress in woven fabric with a smocked bodice and square neckline with concealed elastication and a small frill trim. Short puff sleeves with smocking and a frill trim at the hems, a seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Cropped, smocked top in woven fabric with a small frill trim at the top and bottom, and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Cropped, smocked top in woven fabric with a small frill trim at the top and bottom, and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Short, wide dress in a viscose crêpe weave. Round, lace-trimmed neckline with a V-shaped opening and twisted ties at the front, short sleeves and gathered, lace-trimmed seams on the skirt. Unlined.
Short, wide dress in a viscose crêpe weave. Round, lace-trimmed neckline with a V-shaped opening and twisted ties at the front, short sleeves and gathered, lace-trimmed seams on the skirt. Unlined.
Cropped top in softly draping satin with a draped neckline at the front, low-cut back, narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and concealed zip in one side.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with broderie anglaise. Concealed zip in one side, a gathered seam at the hips and a flare to the hem. Lined.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with broderie anglaise. Concealed zip in one side, a gathered seam at the hips and a flare to the hem. Lined.
Metal hoop earrings, one pair decorated with rhinestones. Diameter 2 cm and 2.4 cm.
A pair of hoop earrings decorated with faceted plastic beads. Diameter 2.5 cm.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with cutaway coverage at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with cutaway coverage at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with cutaway coverage at the back.
Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck and low-cut back with fixed lacing. Medium coverage at the back.
Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck and low-cut back with fixed lacing. Medium coverage at the back.
Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck and low-cut back with fixed lacing. Medium coverage at the back.
Thin metal chain necklace with a rod-shaped pendant. Adjustable length, 42-49 cm.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with a wide flounce at the top and one wide shoulder strap. No fasteners.
A pair of metal hoop earrings decorated with various shaped plastic and glass beads.
Fully lined swimsuit with a wide flounce at the top, one wide shoulder strap and a high cut at the back.
Fully lined swimsuit with a wide flounce at the top, one wide shoulder strap and a high cut at the back.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter from 1 cm to 2.5 cm.

Short, A-line dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Square neckline and short puff sleeves with elastication and a frill trim at the shoulders and hems. Seam under the bust, a concealed zip in one side and a gathered seam with a small frill trim at the hem for added width. Lined.
Shorts in airy linen. Regular drawstring waist with covered elastication, front pockets, fake back pockets and short slits at the hems.
Shorts in airy linen. Regular drawstring waist with covered elastication, front pockets, fake back pockets and short slits at the hems.
Cropped top in crinkled jersey with short puff sleeves that have narrow elastication at the hems and an opening at the back with ties at the hem.

Cropped top in crinkled jersey that can be worn as an off-the-shoulder top with a square neckline and short puff sleeves. Elastication and a small frill trim at the top and around the sleeves and hem.
Top in fluted jersey with a square neckline, buttons down the front and short balloon sleeves with narrow elastication.
Trousers in airy modal twill. Elasticated waist with a small frill trim, zip fly and button and patch front pockets. Loose, relaxed-fit legs with wide elastic at the hems.
Trousers in airy modal twill. Elasticated waist with a small frill trim, zip fly and button and patch front pockets. Loose, relaxed-fit legs with wide elastic at the hems.
Trousers in airy modal twill. Elasticated waist with a small frill trim, zip fly and button and patch front pockets. Loose, relaxed-fit legs with wide elastic at the hems.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and cutaway coverage at the back.

Jacket in a linen and viscose weave with a shawl collar and 3/4-length sleeves with gathers at the cuffs. Concealed pockets in the side seams and a detachable tie belt at the waist. No fasteners. Lined.
Short skirt in a cotton weave with double-layered flounces, the lower layer with an embroidered flower pattern and the top layer with a pompom trim. High waist with wide smocking.
Short skirt in a cotton weave with double-layered flounces, the lower layer with an embroidered flower pattern and the top layer with a pompom trim. High waist with wide smocking.
